# Description

Daniel's research addresses the social impacts of new technologies in daily life, with an emphasis on how individuals and organisations understand how personal information and private exchanges are made public. His current focus includes use of digital media for the purposes of expressing grievances, and denouncing others. In addition to serving as Diamond Open Access Ambassador, Daniel has also published several open access books.

member_name <- "Daniel Trottier"

  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "data sharing", "open access", "open source software", all_of(special_skill), "data management", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)
